sections.heading: Hospitality industry; discrimination prohibited; use of tax proceeds; exemption; definitions9-500
sections.text: 06.Hospitality industry; discrimination prohibited; use of tax proceeds; exemption; definitionsA. A city or town shall not discriminate against hospitality industry businesses in the collection of fees.
